text:
@SpeakerPelosi Bad handling of the Coronavirus crisis of the Trump administration? Refusal of the threat?? Excuse???
That is hilarious & a blatant lie!
They are all doing a great job there right now!

Soon the world will know who is really behind the Wuhan virus....
